content: will create a wide hole in the top of your up ● slip_stitch across each of the 10 sts from row 11 and one in the corner and each of the 14 chains just made this forms the cup s brim ● slip_stitch once more to join ● fo and leave a long tail for attaching to your background 8 🧵 cup handle with a matching cup color ● chain 13 ● single_crochet in first chain increase in next single_crochet in next 3 increase single_crochet in next 3 increase single_crochet in last 2 15 sts ● fo leaving a tail for sewing ● attach to the side of the cup curving it into a c shape stitch from the backside of the cup so it tucks behind naturally 🧵 coffee insert with color b brown ● row 1 chain 12 double_crochet in third chain from hook and in each chain across 10 sts ● attach from the backside of the cup placing it just under the brim use a running stitch in the same color as the cup to secure it 🧵 final assembly ● use the running stitch and your yarn tail to sew the entire cup in place ● stitch around ○ the outer edge of the cup ○ the brim ○ both inner and outer curves of the handle weave in all ends and set aside 9 🧡 heart cookie with color f orange 🧵 heart cookie shape ● row 1 chain 2 single_crochet in the second chain from the hook 1 st ● row 2 chain 1 turn increase in the st 2 sts ● row 3 chain 1 turn increase in both sts 4 sts ● row 4 chain 1 turn increase in first st single_crochet in next 2 sts increase in last st 6 sts ● row 5 chain 1 turn increase in first st single_crochet in next 4 sts increase in last st 8 sts ● row 6 8 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 8 sts we ll now shape the two humps of the heart 🧵 first hump ● row 9 chain 1 turn single_crochet in first 4 sts 4 sts ● row 10 chain 1 turn decrease twice 2 sts ● row 11 chain 1 turn decrease 1 st do not fasten_off instead slip_stitch down the left side of the hump until you reach the first unworked st from row 8 10 🧵 second hump ● slip_stitch into that unworked stitch to begin the second side ● row 12 chain 1 single_crochet across 4 sts ● row 13 chain 1 turn decrease twice 2 sts ● row 14 chain 1 turn decrease 1 st 🧵 border ● slip_stitch around the entire heart working evenly along both stitches and row to create a smooth edging fo and leave a long tail for attaching set aside for now 🧷 attachment use the running stitch and your yarn tail to sew the heart in place 🍥 cinnamon roll with color e light brown 🧵
